TopicTitle: Mk-55 "Thud" engine gimbal is not working in 1.0.5

Articles.Content:
Hello

This is my first post & bug report. I hope it will be helpful .

KSP Version: 1.0.5.1024, Windows 10 x64, updated from 1.0.4.

I am not able to install build 1028 yet (GOG), but this bug is not mentioned in this patch.

What happens:

Mk-55 thrust vectoring settings are visible in VAB and in flight, but gimbals are not moving when trying to turn my craft.

Mods: None

Workaround:

In file GameData\Squad\Parts\Engine\liquidEngineMk55\ liquidEngineMk55.cfg in module "ModuleGimbal" change property "gimbalTransformName" from "Gimbal" to "thrustTransform".
Hi losiek, there was an update to 1.0.5, the buildID.txt will say 1028 in the most recent version and the Thud gimball is working in that version, so please redownload/update KSP.
